H0.text: Conclude that hummingbirds prefer white flowers is the first step the students should take when investigating whether hummingbirds are more likely to visit colored flowers or white flowers after visiting a garden to observe hummingbirds.

H1.text: Writing a report about the kinds of flowers in the garden is the first step students should take to investigate whether hummingbirds are more likely to visit colored flowers or white flowers.

H2.text: Observe hummingbirds at flowers and record the flower color is the first step students should take to investigate whether hummingbirds are more likely to visit colored flowers or white flowers.

H3.text: Researching the number of different hummingbirds that live in the garden is what the students should do first to investigate whether hummingbirds are more likely to visit colored or white flowers.
